analyzed: rjes su mthun pa ni rigs dang mthun pa nyid gal te rtag par byed na de'i tshe dngos grub rten par 'gyur te /
translated: If one makes it permanent, then the spiritual powers will be permanent,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: but not otherwise.

original: 'jigs shing 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g-yo sgyu can dang gzhan dbang 'gyur //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'jigs shing 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g-yo sgyu can dang gzhan dbang 'gyur // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúOne will have a fearful and confused mind, be deceitful, and be under the control of others.‚Äù

original: sems g-yeng ba skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rtse gcig pa nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba ste yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rtse gcig pa nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba ste yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äôs mind will be distracted‚Äù means that it will not be one-pointed, as will be explained.

original: rjes su mthun pa de yang skye ba gzhan dag tu'ang yid gcugs par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni smon lam gyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa de yang skye ba gzhan dag tu'ang yid gcugs par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni smon lam gyi dbang gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat compatibility will also be trusted in other lives‚Äù is due to the power of aspiration.

original: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus lung bstan de dang 'dra ba'i shes rab dang phrad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus lung bstan de dang 'dra ba'i shes rab dang phrad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: By the power of the Buddha's blessing, one will encounter the wisdom that is like that prophecy. This is the meaning.

original: des ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the elaborate mode of conduct.

original: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa la //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa la //
translated: In the mantras, tantras, and so forth,

original: zhes pas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: this teaches the unelaborate mode of conduct.

original: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa la legs par bslabs pa'o zhes pa ni dbang thob pa dang sngags la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa la legs par bslabs pa'o zhes pa ni dbang thob pa dang sngags la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Well trained in the mantras, tantras, and so forth means that one has received empowerment and is skilled in the practice of the mantras and so forth.

original: sgrub pa po dang rjes su mthun par zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa @228a * //
analyzed: sgrub pa po dang rjes su mthun par zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa @228a * //
translated: In accordance with the practitioner means that the pledge seal is a branch of the practice of the great seal.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the pledge seal.

original: ma rnyed na zhes pa ni dkon pa'am sgrub pa po dge slong yin pas so //
analyzed: ma rnyed na zhes pa ni dkon pa'am sgrub pa po dge slong yin pas so //
translated: If one cannot find means that it is rare or that the practitioner is a monk.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The perfection of wisdom, the mother of the buddhas, is the perfection of wisdom sutra.

original: gang las sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi yum ste /
analyzed: gang las sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi yum ste /
translated: That from which all Buddhas arise is the Mother of the Buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the expression ‚ÄúMother of all TathƒÅgatas‚Äù is this.

original: gang zhig kun mkhyen nyid kyis zhi bar 'dod pa'i nyan thos pa rnams nye bar zhi mdzad pa //
analyzed: gang zhig kun mkhyen nyid kyis zhi bar 'dod pa'i nyan thos pa rnams nye bar zhi mdzad pa //
translated: She is the one who pacifies the ≈örƒÅvakas who desire peace through omniscience.

original: gang zhig lam mkhyen nyid kyis 'gro la phan 'dogs mdzad pas sems can don rdzogs pa //
analyzed: gang zhig lam mkhyen nyid kyis 'gro la phan 'dogs mdzad pas sems can don rdzogs pa //
translated: She is the one who fulfills the aims of sentient beings through benefiting the world with knowledge of the path.

original: gang dang 'brel pas rnam pa thams cad sna tshogs 'di nyid thob pa rnams kyi rigs //
analyzed: gang dang 'brel pas rnam pa thams cad sna tshogs 'di nyid thob pa rnams kyi rigs //
translated: She is the one who is the family of those who attain this very variety of all aspects through connection with her.

original: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi yum de la 'dud //
analyzed: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi yum de la 'dud //
translated: I bow to that Mother of the Buddhas, who is endowed with an assembly of ≈örƒÅvakas and Bodhisattvas.

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach just that,

original: rang gi snying la gnas pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: rang gi snying la gnas pa zhes smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúresides in one‚Äôs heart.‚Äù

original: bsgom par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúthat which is to be cultivated.‚Äù

original: phyung la ni yid kyi rang bzhin nyid du rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyung la ni yid kyi rang bzhin nyid du rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúExtracted‚Äù means ‚Äúthat which is to be perfected as having the nature of mind.‚Äù

original: de dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug par bya ste zhes pa ni nags tshal du slong mo za ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: de dang lhan cig snyoms par 'jug par bya ste zhes pa ni nags tshal du slong mo za ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: One should enter into union with her means that one should experience great bliss together with the knowledge consort who has the nature of the magical power of begging in the forest.

original: // lung gi tshad ma nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir snying la gnas pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: // lung gi tshad ma nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir snying la gnas pa zhes smos te /
translated: In order to teach the validity of the scripture, he says who resides in the heart.

original: yid kyi ngo bo nyid du bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi ngo bo nyid du bsgom pa'o //
translated: She is meditated on as having the nature of the mind.

original: lha mo che zhes pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lha mo che zhes pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
translated: The great goddess is called the knowledge consort.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The yogin is endowed with the yoga that has the nature of the union of method and wisdom.

original: rnal 'byor skyed ces pa ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor skyed ces pa ni //
translated: The yoga is

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba ster bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba ster bar byed pa'o //
translated: the bestowal of the bliss of meditative concentration.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi yum du gyur pa ni sngar grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum ste sems tsam mo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi yum du gyur pa ni sngar grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum ste sems tsam mo //
translated: Therefore, the mother of all buddhas is the mind only, the mother of the Tathagatas who have already attained Buddhahood.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya blangs nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams kyis dngos grub thob par gyur to ;
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya blangs nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams kyis dngos grub thob par gyur to ;
translated: Having taken the wisdom-knowledge seal, which is the essence of the perfection of wisdom, the Blessed Buddhas attained power.

original: / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //üîΩces pa ni /üîΩrdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i dbyings ni rdo rje dbyings te /
analyzed: / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad // ces pa ni / rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i dbyings ni rdo rje dbyings te /
translated: The lord of the vajra realm is explained.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: The vajra realm is the vajra-like realm, which is the knowledge of the reality realm.

original: de la dbang mo ni chos nyid kyi ngo bos bdag po nyid du gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la dbang mo ni chos nyid kyi ngo bos bdag po nyid du gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The lord of that is said to be the nature of reality, abiding as the master.

original: mnyes par byas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig dang ye shes @228b kyi phyag rgya dag nye bar bsdus pa dag bstan to //
analyzed: mnyes par byas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig dang ye shes @228b kyi phyag rgya dag nye bar bsdus pa dag bstan to //
translated: The verse beginning with ‚Äúhaving pleased‚Äù teaches the summary of the pledge and knowledge seals.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byas pas ni zhes pa la bde ba chen pos yang dag par rigs pas so //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byas pas ni zhes pa la bde ba chen pos yang dag par rigs pas so //
translated: By experiencing the bliss of supreme joy, by the yoga of great bliss.üîΩOne is not defiled by the afflictions of passion, etc.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gos par mi 'gyur ba'o zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya rnams blangs bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gos par mi 'gyur ba'o zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya rnams blangs bar bya'o //
translated: In order to purify passion, etc., one should take the consorts.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
analyzed: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
translated: Among all the illusions,

original: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
translated: the illusion of a woman is supreme.

original: ye shes gsum gyi dbye bas ni //
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi dbye bas ni //
translated: By the division of the three intuitions,

original: gsal bar 'di las mtshon pas so //
analyzed: gsal bar 'di las mtshon pas so //
translated: it is illustrated here by the clear.

original: rdo rje padma yang dag sbyar //
analyzed: rdo rje padma yang dag sbyar //
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus

original: kun rdzob tu ni gang la'ang med //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni gang la'ang med //
translated: does not exist anywhere in the relative.

original: lan cig tu ni nyams myong bas //
analyzed: lan cig tu ni nyams myong bas //
translated: The experience of it once

original: rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: is accomplished by the power of yoga.

original: ye shes 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: ye shes 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of the entry of intuition

original: ji ltar dbye ba shes nas ni //
analyzed: ji ltar dbye ba shes nas ni //
translated: is known by the division.

original: slar yang rang bzhin de nyid de //
analyzed: slar yang rang bzhin de nyid de //
translated: Again, that very nature

original: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mtshon //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mtshon //
translated: is always illustrated by the yogi.

original: 'dod chags la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par sbyong ba 'ba' zhig tu mi 'gyur gyi 'on kyang sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //üîΩlegs par bslabs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par sbyong ba 'ba' zhig tu mi 'gyur gyi 'on kyang sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to // legs par bslabs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni //
translated: By attachment, etc., it is shown that not only is attachment, etc. purified, but also Buddhahood is attained.

original: shes rab kyi rnam grangs yin pas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi rnam grangs yin pas so //
translated: The seal of the well-trained is a synonym for wisdom.

original: ngo bo nyid shes pas zhes pa ni gang gi don du 'jug pa de nyid mngon du byas pas so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid shes pas zhes pa ni gang gi don du 'jug pa de nyid mngon du byas pas so //
translated: By knowing the nature is meant that the very thing for which one enters is realized.

original: de yi rang bzhin mi shes pas //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin mi shes pas //
translated: Those who do not know its nature,

original: mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa rnams //
analyzed: mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa rnams //
translated: who are obscured by the darkness of ignorance,

original: dge dang mi dge'i las byas nas //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge'i las byas nas //
translated: having done virtuous and non-virtuous actions,

original: 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //üîΩbdag nyid rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur // zhes 'byung ngo // bdag nyid rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste //
translated: wander in the five destinies.üîΩIt is said that one becomes perfect

original: zhes pa ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: means that one will be accomplished without effort.

original: dngos po'i chos ni 'di nyid yin te dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'brel bas de kho na nyid snang ngo //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ni 'di nyid yin te dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'brel bas de kho na nyid snang ngo //
translated: This is the reality of things: the reality appears through the connection of the pledge seal and the wisdom seal.

original: drang ba'i don ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad pas so //
analyzed: drang ba'i don ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad pas so //
translated: The provisional meaning is explained by the conduct that is free from conceptual elaboration.

original: yang lung gis brjod par bya ste zhes pa 'dis shin du spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: yang lung gis brjod par bya ste zhes pa 'dis shin du spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, it should be stated by scriptural authority.

original: chos skur mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid de de bzhin nyid ces bya ba yum mo //
analyzed: chos skur mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid de de bzhin nyid ces bya ba yum mo //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe reality of the Dharma body‚Äù means the nature of the Dharma body, which is called thusness, the mother.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gcig min du ma ma yin rang gzhan phan 'dogs phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: gcig min du ma ma yin rang gzhan phan 'dogs phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa //
translated: Not one, not many, not the basis of benefit for self or other,

original: dngos min dngos med ma yin mkha' bzhin ro gcig ngo bo rtogs par dka' //
analyzed: dngos min dngos med ma yin mkha' bzhin ro gcig ngo bo rtogs par dka' //
translated: not a thing, not a non-thing, like space, of one taste, its essence is difficult to realize.

original: gos med 'gyur med zhi ba @229a * //
analyzed: gos med 'gyur med zhi ba @229a * //
translated: It is not covered, unchanging, peaceful,

original: mi mnyam dang mtshungs khyab byed spros pa med //
analyzed: mi mnyam dang mtshungs khyab byed spros pa med //
translated: equal to the unequalled, pervasive, and free from conceptual elaboration.

original: rang gis rig pa dpe med rgyal ba'i chos kyi sku la rtag tu 'dud //üîΩces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rang gis rig pa dpe med rgyal ba'i chos kyi sku la rtag tu 'dud // ces 'byung ngo //
translated: I constantly bow to the Victor‚Äôs dharmakƒÅya, which is not an example, and is self-awareness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas thob par byed pa'i thabs stong pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas thob par byed pa'i thabs stong pa'o //
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom is the method for attaining the stage of the pure mind, which is emptiness.

original: de nyid yum ste bsgoms pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bur gyur pa dang de las chos thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid yum ste bsgoms pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bur gyur pa dang de las chos thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the mother because it is the result of the nature of meditation and because all phenomena arise from it.

original: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: The various shapes and colors

original: ji ltar sprin rnams du ma ste //
analyzed: ji ltar sprin rnams du ma ste //
translated: are like the many clouds

original: nam mkha'i khams nas byung nas ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nas byung nas ni //
translated: that arise from the element of space

original: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
translated: and dissolve back into it.

original: de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad ni //
analyzed: de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad ni //
translated: In the same way, all natures

original: snang ba gsum gyi rgyur gyur pa //
analyzed: snang ba gsum gyi rgyur gyur pa //
translated: are the cause of the three appearances.

original: yul ni ma lus la 'jug nas //
analyzed: yul ni ma lus la 'jug nas //
translated: Engaging with all objects without exception,

original: 'od gsal bar ni zhugs par 'gyur //üîΩji ltar chu bo dang ba las //
analyzed: 'od gsal bar ni zhugs par 'gyur // ji ltar chu bo dang ba las //
translated: they enter into clear light.üîΩJust as a fish quickly jumps

original: nya ni myur du ldang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nya ni myur du ldang bar 'gyur //
translated: out of still water,

original: thams cad stong pa dam pa las //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa dam pa las //
translated: so too does the supreme emptiness of everythingüîΩenter into clear light.

original: de bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'byung //
analyzed: de bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'byung //
translated: And likewise the arising of the magic web.

original: zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas so //
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor bas //
analyzed: gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor bas //
translated: The union of non-duality and suchness

original: zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas so //
translated: is by the stage of the pure mind.üîΩThe non-entity is the practice of the meaning,

original: dngos med ces bya don spyod pa'o zhes pa ni mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: dngos med ces bya don spyod pa'o zhes pa ni mngon du bya'o //
translated: which is to be realized.

original: des ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the stage of the pure mind.

original: longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin //
translated: That which is equal to the perfect enjoyment

original: zhes pa ni cig car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas spros pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni cig car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas spros pa'i sku'o //
translated: is the emanation body by the stage of the attainment of the light, and so forth.

original: de nyid srid mo ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye par mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid srid mo ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye par mtshon pa'o //
translated: That itself is the sister, indicated by the twelve examples of illusion.

original: rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
analyzed: rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
translated: Endowed with the yoga of one's deity

original: zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa dang ldan pas so //
translated: means endowed with the devotion to Akshobhya and so forth, the Tathagatas.üîΩThe delight by the method of the mantra

original: gsang sngags lugs kyis mnyes par zhes pa ni ye shes kyi sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags lugs kyis mnyes par zhes pa ni ye shes kyi sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: is the meditation on the body of wisdom.

original: des ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the stage of the consecration of oneself.

original: sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo zhes pa ni mig yor dang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje'i sku'i mtshan nyid kyi zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i sku zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo zhes pa ni mig yor dang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje'i sku'i mtshan nyid kyi zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i sku zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The girl with the form of the Emanation Body is the meaning of the body to be attained by means of the stage of union, which has the characteristic of the vajra body, which is like a reflected image and an illusion.

original: sgrub pa pos ni bsgom pa zhes pa nye bar bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos ni bsgom pa zhes pa nye bar bsdus pa'o //
translated: The adept should meditate, which is a summary.

original: ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du phan yon bstan to //
analyzed: ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du phan yon bstan to //
translated: The benefits are taught as before, beginning with ‚Äúmother‚Äù and so forth.

original: des ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: By that, the stage of union is taught.

original: nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bsten pas so //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bsten pas so //
translated: The definitive meaning is by means of the reliance on the stage of mind-only purification, self-consecration, and union.

original: des ni @229b sems shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni @229b sems shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan to //
translated: By that, the conduct of the mind that is completely free of conceptual elaborations is taught.

original: chos 'byung mngon par byang chub pa //
analyzed: chos 'byung mngon par byang chub pa //
translated: The consecration of the source of phenomena

original: chags sogs rol mo rgya che bas //
analyzed: chags sogs rol mo rgya che bas //
translated: is the great play of passion and so forth.

original: chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa //
analyzed: chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa //
translated: The consecration of the realm of reality

original: ji ltar rnyed pa'i spyod pa yis //
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa'i spyod pa yis //
translated: is the conduct of whatever is obtained.

original: bla med mngon par byang chub pa //
analyzed: bla med mngon par byang chub pa //
translated: The unsurpassed manifest enlightenment

original: mngon par byang chub sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub sbyor ba yis //
translated: through the application of manifest enlightenment,

original: spro pa la sogs spyod pa ni //
analyzed: spro pa la sogs spyod pa ni //
translated: the conduct of expansion, etc.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams slob par byed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams slob par byed //
translated: is the training of the yogins.

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rigs ngan la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas snod du ma gyur pa rnams kyis kyang 'bad pa chen pos bsgrub par bya ba sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang snod ma yin pa'i skye bos thob pa thos na ngo mtshar la sogs pa 'gyur ba bstan to
analyzed: rigs ngan la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas snod du ma gyur pa rnams kyis kyang 'bad pa chen pos bsgrub par bya ba sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang snod ma yin pa'i skye bos thob pa thos na ngo mtshar la sogs pa 'gyur ba bstan to
translated: By low caste, etc., etc., it is shown that even those who are not vessels attain the state of Buddhahood through great effort, and that it is amazing, etc., when those who are not vessels attain it.

original: // sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la sogs pa zhes pa ni las kyi rigs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' gzung ba ste spyod pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: // sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la sogs pa zhes pa ni las kyi rigs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' gzung ba ste spyod pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By Sarvanlvaralocana, etc., the Bodhisattvas of the karma family are meant, because they are in accord with the conduct.

original: spyad pa ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid de bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang rlung gi khams rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so ;
analyzed: spyad pa ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid de bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang rlung gi khams rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so ;
translated: Conduct is the characteristic of practice, and is of the nature of the knowledge of successful action and the pure essence of wind.

original: / gzhan du na 'jam dpal la sogs pa ci ste ma blangs so zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: / gzhan du na 'jam dpal la sogs pa ci ste ma blangs so zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: Otherwise, why would Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ and the others not have accepted it? This is the meaning of the words.

original: padma dkar po lta bu'i gang zag la sogs pa dbang po rtul po zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can dang mthun pa'i rol mo rab tu bstan par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de dag rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i don du de lta
analyzed: padma dkar po lta bu'i gang zag la sogs pa dbang po rtul po zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can dang mthun pa'i rol mo rab tu bstan par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de dag rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i don du de lta
translated: The person who is like a white lotus and so on, who is of dull faculties, is a bodhisattva who is teaching the play of the future sentient beings in order to guide them.

original: bu'i spyad pa spyod de /
analyzed: bu'i spyad pa spyod de /
translated: He practices that kind of conduct.

original: gzhan du na 'khrul pa dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sngar med pa'i thob par bya ba ci yod do //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'khrul pa dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sngar med pa'i thob par bya ba ci yod do //
translated: Otherwise, what is there to attain that the bodhisattvas, who are free from error and affliction, have not already attained?

original: gang thos pas de rnams ngo mtshar ba dang rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang thos pas de rnams ngo mtshar ba dang rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By hearing it, they will attain wonder and marvel.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya gtso bos ni //
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya gtso bos ni //
translated: The one called Great Bliss, the chief,üîΩengages in the supreme play of various kinds,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs rol mo'i mchog la 'jug / gang du spros pa thams cad dang bral bas //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs rol mo'i mchog la 'jug / gang du spros pa thams cad dang bral bas //
translated: where, free from all conceptual elaborations,

original: gcig kyang du ma'i ro yis gar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gcig kyang du ma'i ro yis gar mdzad pa'o //
translated: he dances with the taste of multiplicity.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rdo rje'i tshig rnams shes pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig rnams shes pa ni //
translated: The knowledge of the vajra words

original: don zab pa yi tshig rnams so //
analyzed: don zab pa yi tshig rnams so //
translated: is the words of the profound meaning.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa la zhes pa ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i tshig gis de kho na nyid so sor ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa la zhes pa ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i tshig gis de kho na nyid so sor ston par byed pa'o //
translated: With regard to the explanation by intention, the words that contradict the world reveal reality individually.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don la zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba'i tshul du don gzung bar bya ba yin gyi gsal bar bya ba'i tshul du ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don la zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba'i tshul du don gzung bar bya ba yin gyi gsal bar bya ba'i tshul du ma yin no //
translated: With regard to the meaning of the literal expression, the meaning should be grasped in the manner of expression, not in the manner of manifestation.

original: brjod par bya ba dang gsal bar bya ba ni sgra'i don gnyis te sngar gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang gsal bar bya ba ni sgra'i don gnyis te sngar gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: The two meanings of sound are the expressed and the manifested, as previously determined.

original: ci zhes pa ni smod pa'i don la sbyor bas @230a * //
analyzed: ci zhes pa ni smod pa'i don la sbyor bas @230a * //
translated: What is connected to the meaning of contempt,

original: smad par bya ba bstan pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: smad par bya ba bstan pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: so it is thought that what is to be despised is taught.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bdag nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa dang sems can rnams la de ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bdag nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa dang sems can rnams la de ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is endowed with the two accumulations, manifesting the cause and effect of the conventional and ultimate natures, and teaching that to sentient beings.

original: 'phags par gyur pa zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa de ji ltar de bzhin du bstan pa'o zhes pas smod do //
analyzed: 'phags par gyur pa zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa de ji ltar de bzhin du bstan pa'o zhes pas smod do //
translated: The phrase having become noble means that, just as Ak·π£obhya, etc. are the chief among the TathƒÅgatas, so also is he.

original: tshig 'di nyid kyis ni zhes pa ni //
analyzed: tshig 'di nyid kyis ni zhes pa ni //
translated: The phrase by this very statement means

original: sngar bshad pas so //üîΩrang mthong bzhin du gzhan rnams la //
analyzed: sngar bshad pas so // rang mthong bzhin du gzhan rnams la //
translated: by the previous explanation.üîΩAs it is said in the Bodhicittavivara·πáa:

original: nges par bskyed par bya pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nges par bskyed par bya pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to generate it in others,

original: dam pa rnams kyis 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyis 'jug pa ste //
translated: the noble ones engage in it,

original: rtag tu slu ba med pas so //üîΩzhes byang chub sems kyi rnam 'grel las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rtag tu slu ba med pas so // zhes byang chub sems kyi rnam 'grel las 'byung ngo //
translated: because it is always infallible,üîΩjust as they see it themselves.

original: de bzhin du /üîΩskyob pa rang mthong lam ston pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du / skyob pa rang mthong lam ston pa'o //
translated: And also:

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: The protector teaches the path that he himself has seen.

original: de ltar gyur pa gang yin pa des ni tshig ngan pa ston pa mi rigs so zhes bya bas tshig ngan pa gsungs pa'i gnas ma yin par bstan to zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa gang yin pa des ni tshig ngan pa ston pa mi rigs so zhes bya bas tshig ngan pa gsungs pa'i gnas ma yin par bstan to zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, it is said that it is not appropriate to teach bad words by one who is like that, and it is explained that it is not a basis for teaching bad words.

original: rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa zhes pa ni tsandan la sogs pa dang rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rnams so //
analyzed: rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa zhes pa ni tsandan la sogs pa dang rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rnams so //
translated: The ‚Äúperfected‚Äù and ‚Äúimperfected‚Äù refer to the persons who are like sandalwood, etc., and like jewels.

original: de'i tshul rjes su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te sa bcu pa dang bcu gcig pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshul rjes su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te sa bcu pa dang bcu gcig pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bodhisattvas and the tathƒÅgatas are the followers of that way, because they have attained the tenth and eleventh stages.

original: der yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis gsung ba ni mi rigs so zhes bstan to //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis gsung ba ni mi rigs so zhes bstan to //
translated: Here, he teaches that it is not proper to say that ‚Äúthere‚Äù and so on.

original: 'phags pa ma yin pa rab tu 'jug pa'i las kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa ma yin pa rab tu 'jug pa'i las kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristics of the activity of engaging in what is not noble.

original: zhes ni mi dge ba'i las te lus la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu mi dge ba'i las rnam pa bcu zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes ni mi dge ba'i las te lus la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu mi dge ba'i las rnam pa bcu zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúUnwholesome‚Äù means unwholesome activity, the ten kinds of physical, etc., activity. The meaning is that the ten kinds of unwholesome activity are unwholesome activity.

original: de gsung pas na gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: de gsung pas na gsungs pa ste //
translated: ‚ÄúHe taught‚Äù means he spoke.

original: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThe word of the Blessed One‚Äù means the words of the Blessed One.

original: tshig ngan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: tshig ngan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBad words‚Äù and so on are the summary of the activity of grasping.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pas zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pas so //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pas zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAkshobhya, etc.‚Äù means Vajra Mind, etc.

original: de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: To that he said this:

original: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lan ston te rdo rje 'chang chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lan ston te rdo rje 'chang chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the reply to the bodhisattvas, because the great Vajradhara and the Tathagatas, etc., are inseparable.

original: gzhan du na rdo rje 'chang chen po gsung pa po yin na /
analyzed: gzhan du na rdo rje 'chang chen po gsung pa po yin na /
translated: Otherwise, if the great Vajradhara is the speaker,

original: de nyid kyis the tshom sel bar bya ba'i rigs pa yin no zhes pa ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lan btab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis the tshom sel bar bya ba'i rigs pa yin no zhes pa ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lan btab par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be reasonable for him alone to dispel the doubts. Why would the Tathagatas give the reply?

original: bzlog pa ste zhes pa ni yongs su rdzogs @230b pas bzlog pa zhes bya'o //üîΩkhyed rnams kyi bsam pa shes kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas don de nyid bstan to //
analyzed: bzlog pa ste zhes pa ni yongs su rdzogs @230b pas bzlog pa zhes bya'o // khyed rnams kyi bsam pa shes kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas don de nyid bstan to //
translated: The opposite of that is called completely reversed.üîΩThe meaning of that is taught by I know your thoughts, etc.

original: dgongs pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dgongs pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach that very intention,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pas bshad pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid kyi don ston par byed pa'i dgongs pas bshad pas brjod par bya ba'i tshig rnams ni zab pa ma yin pa'i don dang ldan pa'i sgra ji bzhin pas dbye bar mi 'gyur te
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pas bshad pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid kyi don ston par byed pa'i dgongs pas bshad pas brjod par bya ba'i tshig rnams ni zab pa ma yin pa'i don dang ldan pa'i sgra ji bzhin pas dbye bar mi 'gyur te
translated: explain the meaning of that. The words that are to be expressed by the intentional explanation are not to be analyzed by the literal meaning, which is not the profound meaning,

original: / gang gi phyir padma'i rtsa ba'i snal mas lcags kyi lu gu rgyud mi phyed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: / gang gi phyir padma'i rtsa ba'i snal mas lcags kyi lu gu rgyud mi phyed pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is like the fact that the thread of a lotus root does not cut through an iron chain.

original: de bas na log pa'i don bzung bas smod pa'i yid la byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na log pa'i don bzung bas smod pa'i yid la byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the bodhisattvas' intention is to disparage the mental activity that grasps the wrong meaning.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgra ji bzhin pa'i don med pa dgongs pas bshad pa'i de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bshad do zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgra ji bzhin pa'i don med pa dgongs pas bshad pa'i de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bshad do zhes bstan to //
translated: The words because... and so forth teach that the Tathagatas explain the reality of the intentional explanation, which does not have a literal meaning.

original: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni zhes pa la chos thams cad kyi nang khyab pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni zhes pa la chos thams cad kyi nang khyab pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The thusness of phenomena is the emptiness that pervades all phenomena.

original: blo mchog tu gyur pa'i rin po che lta bu'i gang zag ces pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig la snod du rung ba'i slob ma rnams so //
analyzed: blo mchog tu gyur pa'i rin po che lta bu'i gang zag ces pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig la snod du rung ba'i slob ma rnams so //
translated: The person who is like a jewel of the highest mind is a disciple who is a suitable vessel for the stage of completion alone.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i man ngag go //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i man ngag go //
translated: Nonabiding nirvana is the esoteric instruction of union.

original: de la ye shes ni khong du chud pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la ye shes ni khong du chud pa zhes bya ba ni de'i bdag nyid du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There, wisdom is called ‚Äúcomprehension,‚Äù which means ‚Äúengaging in its nature.‚Äù

original: don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: By ‚Äúultimate truth,‚Äù and so on, he causes one to understand the characteristic of the samƒÅdhi of nonduality.

original: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rnams la chos nyid bstan par bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rnams la chos nyid bstan par bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: He teaches that the reality should be taught to the person who is like a jewel.

original: gzhan la ni ma yin te zhes bya bas tsandan la sogs pa la dgag par bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin te zhes bya bas tsandan la sogs pa la dgag par bstan to //
translated: By ‚Äúnot to others,‚Äù he teaches the prohibition to the sandalwood and so on.

original: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdu ba bstan to //
analyzed: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdu ba bstan to //
translated: The summary is taught by ‚ÄúTherefore, etc.‚Äù

original: byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa ni byang chub spyod pa ste //
analyzed: byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa ni byang chub spyod pa ste //
translated: The conduct for attaining enlightenment is the conduct of enlightenment.

original: spros pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa gsum mo //
analyzed: spros pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa gsum mo //
translated: It is the three conducts of elaboration, etc.

original: gnas ni de'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i byang chub spyod pa'i gnas te rdo rje 'chang nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: gnas ni de'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i byang chub spyod pa'i gnas te rdo rje 'chang nyid du bstan to //
translated: The abode is the abode of the conduct of enlightenment, which is the result of that, and is taught as being Vajradhara.

original: 'di ni 'di nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pas the tshom med par spyod pa des rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pas the tshom med par spyod pa des rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
translated: ‚Äú This is that‚Äù and so forth teaches that by that conduct without doubt one will attain Vajradhara.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa zhes pa ni spyod pa ji ltar gsungs zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa zhes pa ni spyod pa ji ltar gsungs zhes bshad pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Just the words‚Äù means that the conduct is taught just as it is.

original: bshad zin to zhes pa ni le'u dang po las so //üîΩde'i rnam par smin pa tsha ba'i phyir zhes pa @231a * //
analyzed: bshad zin to zhes pa ni le'u dang po las so // de'i rnam par smin pa tsha ba'i phyir zhes pa @231a * //
translated: ‚Äú Already explained‚Äù means in the first chapter.

original: ni mnar med pa la sogs pa la ltung ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin pas so //
analyzed: ni mnar med pa la sogs pa la ltung ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Because its ripening is hot‚Äù means that it is the natural outflow result of falling into the Avƒ´ci hell, etc.

original: bya ba ma yin pas zhes pa ni srog gcod la sogs pa mi byed pas so //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pas zhes pa ni srog gcod la sogs pa mi byed pas so //
translated: By not doing what should be done means by not doing such things as taking life.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'das pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba thos pas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'das pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba thos pas so //
translated: By transgressing the word of the Lord means by hearing the fundamental transgression which has the characteristic of transgressing the word of the Sugata.

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to teach the result of the fundamental transgression, he says, ‚Äúthe fear of hell,‚Äù

original: dka' ba ma spangs pas dus byas te khyod dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dka' ba ma spangs pas dus byas te khyod dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is explained that you will die without having given up the difficulty and will fall into hell.üîΩBy being confused about what should be done, you will wander in cyclic existence.

original: bya ba la rmongs pas kun du 'khor bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni bsam pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: bya ba la rmongs pas kun du 'khor bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni bsam pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the idea.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa byed pa'am yang na srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi byed do zhes phyogs gcig la brten pa dang / phyogs gnyis pa yongs su spong ba'am yang na de las ldog pa zhes rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung blang bar bya ba yin nam ma yin zhes the tshom dang ldan pa'i blos gnyis pa'ang mi bya'o zhes yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa byed pa'am yang na srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi byed do zhes phyogs gcig la brten pa dang / phyogs gnyis pa yongs su spong ba'am yang na de las ldog pa zhes rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung blang bar bya ba yin nam ma yin zhes the tshom dang ldan pa'i blos gnyis pa'ang mi bya'o zhes yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro
translated: One should not do that which is reprehensible as spoken by the Lord, or one should not do such things as killing, or one should rely on one side, or one should completely avoid the second side, or one should do the opposite. Or, Is the word of the Lord to be accepted or not? One should not do a second thing with a mind full of doubt.

original: // phyi nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa'i gsung thos pa'i dga' ba las 'byung ba'am rgyal ba thob pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: // phyi nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa'i gsung thos pa'i dga' ba las 'byung ba'am rgyal ba thob pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: Afterward, etc., shows the joy arising from hearing the definitive statement, or the attainment of victory itself.

original: nges pa'i don zhes pa ni rdo rje'i tshig gi khyad par te sngar khong du chud pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i don zhes pa ni rdo rje'i tshig gi khyad par te sngar khong du chud pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The definitive meaning is a special vajra statement, because it is just as the previously understood meaning is reasonable.

original: sngon chad ma rtogs pa'i chos nyid rtogs pas zhes pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i don thos pas so //
analyzed: sngon chad ma rtogs pa'i chos nyid rtogs pas zhes pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i don thos pas so //
translated: The phrase because of the realization of the reality that was not previously realized means that [the disciple] hears the meaning that is explained by the intention.

original: de yid rtse gcig tu gyur pas zhes pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba la bsam pa dang bsgom pa la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yid rtse gcig tu gyur pas zhes pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'i chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba la bsam pa dang bsgom pa la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase because of the one-pointedness of his mind means that he possesses a mind that is intent on reflection and meditation on the nature of reality that is explained by the intention.

original: drang ba'i don to zhes pa ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to zhes pa ni thos pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase the interpretable meaning means that [the disciple] is connected with the wisdom that has the nature of hearing and so forth.

original: yang lung gis bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa'i don bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: yang lung gis bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa'i don bstan par bya ste /
translated: Again, the phrase the definitive meaning and so forth teaches the definitive meaning.

original: mi g-yo ba ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i stong pa chen po'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba'i stong pa chen po'o //
translated: The phrase the immovable means the great emptiness that is to be attained by the stage of the purification of mind.

original: de las kyang gsang ba ni thams cad stong pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang gsang ba ni thams cad stong pa'o //
translated: The phrase and the secret means the emptiness of everything.

original: zhi ba ni rnam par shes pa dang snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba ni rnam par shes pa dang snang ba med pa'o //
translated: The phrase the peace means the non-existence of consciousness and appearance.

original: gcig ni gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig ni gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: The phrase the one means the non-dual.

original: bde ba zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: bde ba zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Bliss is great bliss.

original: rang bzhin @231b thams cad spangs pas na mchog go //
analyzed: rang bzhin @231b thams cad spangs pas na mchog go //
translated: Supreme is because of the abandonment of all natures.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa //
translated: It is the cause of attaining complete enlightenment.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the attainment of the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is said to be the intention of the Bhagavat.

original: de yang rnal 'byor pas mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bstan to //üîΩnam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor pas mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bstan to // nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis //
translated: And that is to be realized by the yogi. This teaches the stage of the purification of the mind.üîΩBy the yoga of infinite space,

original: zhes pa la nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis so //
analyzed: zhes pa la nam mkha' bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis so //
translated: By the yoga of the illusion-like infinity of space.

original: de'i 'brel pas gzugs la sogs pa ni sgyu ma'i rnam pas mtshon pa'i ye shes kyi sku yang mtha' yas pa ste sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'brel pas gzugs la sogs pa ni sgyu ma'i rnam pas mtshon pa'i ye shes kyi sku yang mtha' yas pa ste sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas mtshon pa'o //
translated: By that connection, form and so forth are also infinite, indicated by the illusory aspect, the wisdom body indicated by the twelve examples of illusion.üîΩThat is said to be the Tathagata,

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpar bshad //
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpar bshad //
translated: And also the Bodhisattva.

original: ces pa ni sgyu ma nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i lha'i sku'i 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa ni sgyu ma nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i lha'i sku'i 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that the aggregates, elements, and sense-fields are related to the body of the deity, which is illustrated by the very illusion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir khams gsum pa thams cad bstan pa la sogs pas bsdu ba ni 'dul bar mdzad pa rnal 'byor pas ye shes kyi sku gzung ba gang yin pa de nyid lus kyi dkyil 'khor yin te dkyil 'khor pa thams cad de nyid du bsdus pas
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir khams gsum pa thams cad bstan pa la sogs pas bsdu ba ni 'dul bar mdzad pa rnal 'byor pas ye shes kyi sku gzung ba gang yin pa de nyid lus kyi dkyil 'khor yin te dkyil 'khor pa thams cad de nyid du bsdus pas
translated: Therefore, the inclusion of all the three realms in the body mandala is the yoga practitioner's retention of the body of intuition, and all the mandala circles are included in that.

original: so // lus rtog la zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i lus de las sar zhing sar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pas spro bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bar gyur zhes bstan to //
analyzed: so // lus rtog la zhes pa ni sgyu ma'i lus de las sar zhing sar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pas spro bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bar gyur zhes bstan to //
translated: The body-conception is the body of illusion, and the one who emanates the stages of the mandala circle from that body of illusion is the Bodhisattva Victorious One.

original: des ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the stage of self-consecration, which has the nature of the beatific body and the emanation body.

original: de ltar bde ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i bde ba chen po bskyed pas so //
analyzed: de ltar bde ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i bde ba chen po bskyed pas so //
translated: Thus, bliss is the generation of great bliss similar to that.

original: bskul pa ni khyab pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mi shes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su gcod pas rnam par mi rtog par gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan
analyzed: bskul pa ni khyab pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mi shes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su gcod pas rnam par mi rtog par gyur pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan
translated: The exhortation is: ‚ÄúThe bodhisattvas who are pervaded by the yoga of non-conceptuality, which is the complete elimination of all conceptual thoughts such as desire, will become victorious.‚Äù

original: to // des ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: to // des ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can gyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The definitive meaning is because the stage of completion, which has the characteristic of the three stages of the purification of the mind, the self-consecration, and the manifest enlightenment, is taught.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsol ba 'debs pa bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsol ba 'debs pa bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The literal meaning is because the request of MahƒÅvajradhara is taught.

original: @232a * // sogs pa'i sgras shes par bya'o //
analyzed: @232a * // sogs pa'i sgras shes par bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù should be understood.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i zhes pa ni spros pa thams cad las nges par grol ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i zhes pa ni spros pa thams cad las nges par grol ba'o //
translated: The phrase similar to that refers to the complete liberation from all conceptual elaborations.

original: gnyis su med pas ni zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pas ni zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la zhugs pa'o //
translated: The phrase by means of nonduality refers to the attainment of the defining characteristic of the meditative absorption of union.

original: de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob pa'i rdo rje'i sku'o //
analyzed: de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob pa'i rdo rje'i sku'o //
translated: The phrase in that way and so forth refers to the vajra body that is attained by means of the meditative absorption of union.

original: 'od zer yang dag par bsdus pa zhes pa ni rang gi sku las byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'od zer yang dag par bsdus pa zhes pa ni rang gi sku las byung ba'o //
translated: The phrase the light rays are completely withdrawn means that they emerge from one's own body.

original: reg par gyur pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni zla ba'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar bsil ba byang chub sems dpa'i lus las phab pas so //
analyzed: reg par gyur pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni zla ba'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar bsil ba byang chub sems dpa'i lus las phab pas so //
translated: The phrase merely by the contact means that they descend from the body of the bodhisattva, who is cool like the light rays of the moon.

original: rang rang gi stan la yang gnas par gyur to zhes pa ni padma dang zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: rang rang gi stan la yang gnas par gyur to zhes pa ni padma dang zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
translated: The phrase they each remained in their own seats means that they are seated on the seats of lotuses, moons, suns, and so forth.

original: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i brgyal ba sangs nas dran pa thob par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i brgyal ba sangs nas dran pa thob par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase having regained their senses and their memory means that they have regained their memory from the fainting that arose from the meditation.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir dran pa slar yang so sor rnyed par gyur to zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir dran pa slar yang so sor rnyed par gyur to zhes bstan to //
translated: In order to teach just that, he says, ‚Äúmemory is again found individually.‚Äù

original: drang ba'i don to zhes pa ni spro ba tsam ston par byed pa'i sogs pa'i sgras so //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to zhes pa ni spro ba tsam ston par byed pa'i sogs pa'i sgras so //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúinterpretable‚Äù is that it is taught as mere enthusiasm.

original: stong pa nyid gsum ni stong pa dang shin du stong pa dang chen po stong pa ste sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas thob par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gsum ni stong pa dang shin du stong pa dang chen po stong pa ste sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas thob par bya'o //
translated: The three emptinesses are emptiness, great emptiness, and supreme emptiness, which are to be attained by the process of mantra and seal.

original: 'od gsal ba zhes pa ni stong pa gsum gyi rgyu can 'bras bur gyur pa ste thams cad stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba zhes pa ni stong pa gsum gyi rgyu can 'bras bur gyur pa ste thams cad stong pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLuminosity‚Äù is the effect that has the three emptinesses as its cause, which is the emptiness of everything.üîΩEmptiness, great emptiness,

original: stong pa shin tu stong pa dang // stong pa chen po gsum pa ste //
analyzed: stong pa shin tu stong pa dang // stong pa chen po gsum pa ste //
translated: and supreme emptiness, the third,

original: bzhi pa thams cad stong pa ni //
analyzed: bzhi pa thams cad stong pa ni //
translated: the fourth is the emptiness of everything.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas so //
translated: By the division of cause and effect.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: zung du 'jug pa ni gang gi phyir zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa las rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas bsgom pa ni med do //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa ni gang gi phyir zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa las rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas bsgom pa ni med do //
translated: The union is that, because of the process of union, there is no meditation by the division of cause and effect.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni //
translated: The nature of cause and effect

original: rang bzhin med par byas nas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin med par byas nas so //
translated: Having made it devoid of intrinsic nature,

original: rnal 'byor pa ni gang gnas pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni gang gnas pa //
translated: the yogi/nƒ´ abides.

original: zung 'jug sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zung 'jug sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so //
translated: This is the union taught by the Buddha.

original: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste //
analyzed: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste //
translated: Since it is indivisible, it is vajra.

original: zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa ting nge 'dzin la rnam pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zung du 'jug pa ting nge 'dzin la rnam pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This means that in the samƒÅdhi of union, the concepts of form and so forth and the concepts of impure and pure and so forth do not arise.

original: rnam bcas dngos po'i rtog pa dang / rnam pa med pa'i rtog pa ste //üîΩgcig tu byas nas spyod pa ni //
analyzed: rnam bcas dngos po'i rtog pa dang / rnam pa med pa'i rtog pa ste // gcig tu byas nas spyod pa ni //
translated: The concept of an entity with form and the concept of formlessness,üîΩhaving made them one,

original: zung 'jug rim pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: zung 'jug rim pa de bzhin no //
translated: the practice is the stage of union.üîΩJust as the fragrance of camphor and

original: ji ltar dri bzang ga pur dang // de ltar mi gtsang dri bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dri bzang ga pur dang // de ltar mi gtsang dri bzhin no //
translated: just so the fragrance of feces.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: This and so forth occurs.

original: de skad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la @232b bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la @232b bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur to //
translated: This and so forth means that the BhagavƒÅn abides in such a samƒÅdhi.

original: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas stong pa chen po la sogs pa la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis dbyer med pas gnas pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid thob par gyur pa'o zhes
analyzed: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas stong pa chen po la sogs pa la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis dbyer med pas gnas pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid thob par gyur pa'o zhes
translated: By ‚Äúimmovable‚Äù and so forth, he attained the state of Great Vajradhara, the identity of the two bodies of the Bodhisattva, the Enjoyment Body and the Emanation Body, which are inseparable, abiding in the Great Empty and so forth.

original: pa rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs par gyur to //
analyzed: pa rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs par gyur to //
translated: He became similar to his own samadhi.

original: de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni rim pa lnga'i de kho na nyid khong du chud pas so //
analyzed: de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni rim pa lnga'i de kho na nyid khong du chud pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy mere empowerment‚Äù means by understanding the reality of the five stages.

original: snang ba'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis zhes pa ni kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis so //
analyzed: snang ba'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis zhes pa ni kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the mass of light of appearance‚Äù means by the mass of light rays of five colors.

original: rlung ni reg pa'o zhes pa ni reg pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: rlung ni reg pa'o zhes pa ni reg pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúWind is touch‚Äù means that it has the quality of touch.

original: des reg pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni 'bru mang po la 'od ni mchog tu gzung ba'o //
analyzed: des reg pa tsam gyis zhes pa ni 'bru mang po la 'od ni mchog tu gzung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy mere contact with that‚Äù means that the light is taken as supreme among the many grains.

original: tsam zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid de 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: tsam zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid de 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMere‚Äù means the reality of wind, which is clear light.

original: des na 'od de khams phra ba la rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas zhes smos pa la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na 'od de khams phra ba la rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas zhes smos pa la bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, the light is the light rays of pristine consciousness that enter into the subtle element.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spros la /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spros la /
translated: The thought is that Great Vajradhara, who has entered the samƒÅdhi of union, emanates the wheel of light rays

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang la 'jug pa'i sems kyi rgyud la 'jug ste /üîΩcig car ram snang ba mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba yid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi sku blangs la rang rang gi gdan gyi brdar bstan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sems can gyi
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang la 'jug pa'i sems kyi rgyud la 'jug ste / cig car ram snang ba mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas thob par bya ba yid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi sku blangs la rang rang gi gdan gyi brdar bstan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sems can gyi
translated: and enters the mindstream of the bodhisattvas who are entering the stage of lucid clarity.

original: don bya ba la nus pa dang ldan par mdzad do zhes ston to //
analyzed: don bya ba la nus pa dang ldan par mdzad do zhes ston to //
translated: Simultaneously or in stages, such as the offering of the appearances, they take up the j√±ƒÅnakƒÅya of the nature of mind that is to be attained through the stage of self-consecration and are empowered to perform the benefit of sentient beings in their respective world systems, which are indicated by their seats.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba las ldang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba las ldang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to demonstrate that, they arise from lucid clarity.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: This is taught by the words beginning with ‚Äúthe ultimate truth.

original: nges pa'i don te zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i don te zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äù ‚Äú Definitive meaning‚Äù is because of teaching the stage of mind-only, self-consecration, and union.

original: zab pa'i chos ston pa zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i sgra'i sgo nas spyod pa gsum gyis thob par bya ba'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zab pa'i chos ston pa zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i sgra'i sgo nas spyod pa gsum gyis thob par bya ba'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Teaching the profound Dharma‚Äù is because of teaching reality to be attained by the three conducts through the door of contradictory words.

original: de la mkhas pa ni 'jig rten las 'gal ba'i sgra'i sgo nas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa ni 'jig rten las 'gal ba'i sgra'i sgo nas gsungs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Skillful‚Äù is because of teaching through the door of contradictory words in the world.

original: sngon ma byung ba zhes pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa tsam gyis srog gcod pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sngon ma byung ba zhes pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa tsam gyis srog gcod pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Never before heard‚Äù is because of engaging in killing, etc., through mere literalness.

original: gyur pa ni dgongs pas bshad pas de'i don yongs su spangs te de kho na nyid kyi don la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gyur pa ni dgongs pas bshad pas de'i don yongs su spangs te de kho na nyid kyi don la 'jug pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Changed‚Äù is because of abandoning the meaning of that through the explanation of the intention and engaging in the meaning of reality.

original: rmad du gyur pa ni gzhan thos pa dang rnam pa gzhan sgrub @233a * //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa ni gzhan thos pa dang rnam pa gzhan sgrub @233a * //
translated: ‚Äú Wonderful‚Äù is because of hearing something else and accomplishing something else.

original: pa'o // rangs te zhes pa ni rmad du byung ba nyid kyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: pa'o // rangs te zhes pa ni rmad du byung ba nyid kyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i sems kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par ro //
translated: The word delighted is a mental state that is the result of the wonder.

original: bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i sgras gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig bstan pas so //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i sgras gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig bstan pas so //
translated: The word said is the teaching of the principal word with the word also.

original: rtogs shing zhes pa ni mngon du byas pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs shing zhes pa ni mngon du byas pa'o //
translated: The word realized is manifested.

original: ting nge 'dzin khyad par zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par dag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin khyad par zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par dag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The special samƒÅdhi is the completion stage that has the characteristics of the pure mind, and so on.

original: des bskyed pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pas sems can gyi tshogs zhes pa ni khams gsum la gnas pa'i rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: des bskyed pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob pas sems can gyi tshogs zhes pa ni khams gsum la gnas pa'i rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa'o //
translated: The host of sentient beings are the jewel-like persons who abide in the three realms.

original: de rnams gzigs pa ni gzigs pas dges pas khyab par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gzigs pa ni gzigs pas dges pas khyab par gyur pa'o //
translated: The beholding of those is the pervasion of delight by the vision.

original: rnam pa de lta bu zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The suchness is that which will be explained.

original: chos dang yang dag par ldan ba zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nges pa med pa yon tan gyi tshogs la bstod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chos dang yang dag par ldan ba zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma nges pa med pa yon tan gyi tshogs la bstod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with the Dharma‚Äù means endowed with the praise of the host of good qualities, which is not uncertain, by the BhagavƒÅn.

original: chos bstan pas dges pas zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rgyur gyur pa spyod pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can gyi chos bstan pas mgu ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos bstan pas dges pas zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rgyur gyur pa spyod pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can gyi chos bstan pas mgu ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúDelighted by the teaching of the Dharma‚Äù means delighted by the teaching of the Dharma, which has the characteristic of the three conducts, which is the cause of the completion stage.

original: chos bstan pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nges gsungs pa'i chos dang gsung pa po la dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos bstan pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nges gsungs pa'i chos dang gsung pa po la dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBy means of the teaching of the Dharma‚Äù and so forth is because the Dharma that is taught and the teacher are inseparable.

original: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes le'u dang po nas bstan pas so //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes le'u dang po nas bstan pas so //
translated: The one who expresses and the one who is expressed are the nature of MahƒÅvajradhara, as taught from the first chapter.

original: bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos so //üîΩzhes pa la rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos so // zhes pa la rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The Dharma has the characteristic of being taught.üîΩ‚ÄúThe one who expresses‚Äù is the nature of the one who expresses.

original: des bstan pa'i don zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: des bstan pa'i don zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe meaning that is taught by that‚Äù is the nature of the one who is expressed.

original: mtshon pa zhes pa ni 'chad pa po'i 'dod pas sgra rnams kyi sbyor ba yin gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no / rjod par byed pa gang dang gang//
analyzed: mtshon pa zhes pa ni 'chad pa po'i 'dod pas sgra rnams kyi sbyor ba yin gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no / rjod par byed pa gang dang gang//
translated: The term ‚Äúdenotation‚Äù is the application of words by the desire of the speaker, not otherwise.üîΩWhatever is the means of expression

original: 'chad pa pos ni nges sbyor ba //
analyzed: 'chad pa pos ni nges sbyor ba //
translated: is applied by the speaker.

original: phyi yi don la ma rtogs pa //
analyzed: phyi yi don la ma rtogs pa //
translated: Not realizing the external object,

original: tshig de da bzhin rjod byed pa'o //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: tshig de da bzhin rjod byed pa'o // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: that word is expressed as it is.

original: chos ni brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: chos ni brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the expressed is the Dharma.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rjes su smra ba tsam yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rjes su smra ba tsam yin no //
translated: Thus, it is merely a repetition.

original: gang yin zhes bya 'dri ba la //
analyzed: gang yin zhes bya 'dri ba la //
translated: In response to the question ‚ÄúWhat is it?‚Äù

original: chos ni thos pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos ni thos pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The Dharma has the nature of hearing.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan btab pa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan btab pa bstan te /
translated: Thus, the answer is shown.

original: chos ni sgra yin pas rna bas gzung bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos ni sgra yin pas rna bas gzung bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the Dharma is sound, it is to be apprehended by the ear.

original: don dag pa ni bsam pa'i rang bzhin no zhes pa la rigs pa bzhi'i sgo nas chos de nyid rnam par dpyad na dag pa'i don du 'gyur te don nges par rtogs pa dang the tshom bral bas so //
analyzed: don dag pa ni bsam pa'i rang bzhin no zhes pa la rigs pa bzhi'i sgo nas chos de nyid rnam par dpyad na dag pa'i don du 'gyur te don nges par rtogs pa dang the tshom bral bas so //
translated: The pure object has the nature of reflection. When that Dharma is analyzed by means of the four principles, it becomes the pure object, because the meaning is ascertained and free from doubt.

original: de dag mngon sum @233b byas pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa rdzogs na chos kyi don bsgom par bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: de dag mngon sum @233b byas pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa rdzogs na chos kyi don bsgom par bya bar rigs so //
translated: When one has completed hearing and reflection, it is appropriate to cultivate the meaning of the Dharma.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach just that,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bstan to //
translated: it is taught as ‚ÄúMahƒÅvajradhara.‚ÄùüîΩI pay homage and bow to you,

original: de lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: de lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: who is like that.

original: ces bya ba 'dis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dang de'i gzhi can gyi thos pa dang bsam pa dang de'i bsgom pa dang de'i 'bras bur gyur pa de kho na nyid kyi sku gcig pa rdo rje 'chang la bstod pa bstan to //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'dis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dang de'i gzhi can gyi thos pa dang bsam pa dang de'i bsgom pa dang de'i 'bras bur gyur pa de kho na nyid kyi sku gcig pa rdo rje 'chang la bstod pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the praise of the one body of suchness, Vajradhara, which is the object of expression, the means of expression, the basis of that, the hearing, the reflection, the cultivation of that, and the result of that.

original: rdo rje 'chang yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo yin pas phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra gnyis pa bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo yin pas phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra gnyis pa bstan to //
translated: Since Vajradhara is the essence of the inseparability of the conventional and the ultimate, the second term of homage is taught.

original: de bzhin du 'og tu yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og tu yang sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, it is applied below as well.

original: sku la sogs pa phan tshun tha dad pa ma yin no//
analyzed: sku la sogs pa phan tshun tha dad pa ma yin no//
translated: The body and so on are not different from each other.

original: zhes pa ni sems ni lus lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems ni lus lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is said that the mind is like the body, and so on.

original: 'od gsal ba ste zhes pa ni glo bur gyi dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ste zhes pa ni glo bur gyi dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is luminous, because it is not soiled by adventitious stains.

original: de'i gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas thob par bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas thob par bya zhes bya'o //
translated: Its abode, etc., means that it is to be attained by the process of mantra and seal.

original: skye dang 'gag pa dang bral ba zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba ste 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye dang 'gag pa dang bral ba zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba ste 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from birth and cessation, because it is luminous and uncompounded.
